it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps21.model.player.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedPlayer

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to store the status of each player. It stores the following datas of a player:
  • Player's deck, containing the cards he acquired during the game (Territory Cards, Building Cards, Character Cards and Venture Cards)
  • Personal bonus tile
  • Color (id): one of the possible values of the PlayerColor enum, used also to identify the player
  • Properties: resources (wood, coins, servants, stones) and points (military points, victory points and faith points).
  • Modifiers of player's actions
  • Family: the player's family members.
Author:
fabri

      • getProperties

        public PlayerProperties getProperties()

        Returns:
        object containing the player's properties.

      • getActivableWorks

        public java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> getActivableWorks(int value,
                                                              WorkType workType)
                                                       throws IllegalCardTypeException
        Used to retrieve the work cards that the player can activate when he performs a harvest/production action.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the harvest/production action, which determines which cards can be activated.
        workType - HARVEST or PRODUCTION
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of DevelopmentCards, containing the harvest/production cards that the player can activate.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if workType argument is not one of HARVEST or PRODUCTION.
        IllegalCardTypeException

      • getMemberValue

        public int getMemberValue(FamilyMember member,
                          DevelopmentCard card)
        Returns the dice value required to acquire a specific card. This method takes into account also the modifiers that modifies the value according to the type of the card.
        Parameters:
        member - Family Member used to acquire the card
        card - Card to acquire.
        Returns:
        the dice value required to acquire a specific card.

        Returns:
        TRUE if the player satisfies the requirements (i.e. : he has at least the number of resources required), FALSE if not.

      • checkRequirement

        public boolean checkRequirement(Requirement req)
        Checks if the player has enough properties (points, resources and number of cards) to meet the specific requirement passed as argument.
        Parameters:
        req - requirement that is compared to the player's properties
        Returns:
        true if the player's properties are greater than the requirements (the requirements are met); otherwise false

      • metCardRequirements

        public java.util.ArrayList<Requirement> metCardRequirements(Card card)
        Between all the requirements (in OR) of the card, this method returns only the ones that are met by the player.
        Parameters:
        card - the card
        Returns:
        the card's requirements that are met by the player.

      • checkCardRequirements

        public boolean checkCardRequirements(DevelopmentCard card)
        Checks the card's requirements in OR and returns TRUE if at least one of them is met by the player. To be used to check if the player can take a Development card.
        Parameters:
        card -
        Returns:
        TRUE if the player has enough points/resources to acquire the card

      • checkCardRequirements

        public boolean checkCardRequirements(LeaderCard card)
        Checks the requirements of the card's effects in OR and returns TRUE if at least one of them is met by the player. To be used to check if the player can activate a Leader card.
        Parameters:
        card -
        Returns:
        TRUE if the player has enough points/resources to acquire activate the Leader
